item.sql: INSERT INTO tbk_led_base_dtls ( lbd_cus_number, lbd_id, lbd_other_id, lbd_name, lbd_brand, lbd_ip, lbd_chl, lbd_port, lbd_dept_id, lbd_area_id, lbd_room_id, lbd_dvc_addrs, lbd_dvc_stts, lbd_use_stts, lbd_seq, lbd_crte_time, lbd_crte_user_id, lbd_updt_time, lbd_updt_user_id, lbd_width, lbd_height ) values( :lbd_cus_number, :id, :lbd_other_id, :name, :lbd_brand, :lbd_ip, :lbd_chl, :lbd_port, :lbd_dept_id, :lbd_area_id, :lbd_room_id, :lbd_dvc_addrs, :lbd_dvc_stts, :lbd_use_stts, :lbd_seq, SYSDATE, :lbd_crte_user_id, SYSDATE, :lbd_updt_user_id, :lbd_width, :lbd_height )

SELECT DISTINCT '' || lbd_id id, '1-' || lbd_area_id pid, lbd_name name, 'talk.png' icon, '1' AS type, lbd_cus_number, lbd_other_id, lbd_brand, lbd_ip, lbd_chl, lbd_port, lbd_dept_id, b.odd_name AS lbd_dept_name, lbd_area_id, a.abd_area_name AS lbd_area_name, lbd_room_id, lbd_dvc_addrs, lbd_dvc_stts, lbd_use_stts, lbd_seq, lbd_crte_user_id, lbd_updt_user_id, lbd_width, lbd_height FROM tbk_led_base_dtls p INNER JOIN (select abd_area_id, abd_area_name from (SELECT odd_id FROM sys_org_dept_dtls START WITH odd_id = ? CONNECT BY prior odd_id = odd_parent_id) INNER JOIN com_org_area_rltn ON oar_dept_id = odd_id INNER JOIN com_area_base_dtls ON abd_area_id = oar_area_id ) a ON p.lbd_area_id = a.abd_area_id LEFT JOIN sys_org_dept_dtls b ON (lbd_cus_number = odd_parent_id AND lbd_dept_id = odd_id) UNION ALL SELECT '1-' || abd_area_id id, '1-' || abd_parent_id pid, abd_area_name name, 'area.png' icon, '0' AS type, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null FROM com_area_base_dtls t

UPDATE tbk_led_base_dtls SET lbd_other_id = :lbd_other_id, lbd_name = :lbd_name, lbd_brand = :lbd_brand, lbd_ip = :lbd_ip, lbd_chl = :lbd_chl, lbd_port = :lbd_port, lbd_dept_id = :lbd_dept_id, lbd_area_id = :lbd_area_id, lbd_room_id = :lbd_room_id, lbd_dvc_addrs = :lbd_dvc_addrs, lbd_dvc_stts = :lbd_dvc_stts, lbd_use_stts = :lbd_use_stts, lbd_width = :lbd_width, lbd_height = :lbd_height WHERE lbd_cus_number = :lbd_cus_number AND lbd_id = :lbd_id
